defaultData.name: Rice Ball
defaultData.description: A delicious ball of cooked rice
defaultData.instructions: 1. Cook the rice in a rice cooker 2. Let the rice cool down 3. Roll rice into a ball

defaultData.name: Spam Musubi
defaultData.ingredients: 1 cup rice, 1 piece of nori, 1 slice of spam
defaultData.instructions: 1. rice on bottom 2. spam on top 3. wrap with nori 4. eat
